welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Staffanstorp, Sweden! Known for its beautiful scenery and friendly atmosphere, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sturup Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights at Kastrup Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic and regional flights at Kastrup Airport.

wifi.note: Limited free access with option to purchase higher speed.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ljungbyhed Airport offers a variety of services for passengers including check-in, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: For private and charter flights, the private aviation terminal at Ljungbyhed Airport offers a VIP lounge and dedicated services for a more comfortable and efficient travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
